Player History
Signed as a free agent by New York (A) on 4/1/1985 to a minor league deal...
Traded from New York (Y) to Chicago on 4/11/1986 (Going to CHC: P Ron Guidry, 3B Jim Leyritz, CF Chuck Carr. Going to NYY: P Joe Kraemer)...
Had first career hit on 5/26/1990, off Bruce Tanner (STL)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/12/1990, off John Trautwein (MON)...
Won World Series with Chicago in 1992...
2/2/1993: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,948,571 through salary arbitration...
